Title: Object: Flight into Egypt
Description: The Virgin sitting and holding the infant Jesus, both smiling towards the viewer, the child with His right hand around her neck, while St Joseph sits on the right, looking over his shoulder towards the view; after Maratta; with production details only. 1797 Etching and stipple
Bibliographic references: Calabi & De Vesme 1928 / Francesco Bartolozzi. Catalogue des estampes et notice biographique d'après les manuscrits de A. De Vesme entièrement réformés et complétés d'une étude critique par A. Calabi (92) (undescribed state between III and IV)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Clayton Mordaunt Cracherode (Inscribed on the verso with CMC monogram in Cracherode's hand (Lugt 607) and with remains of date trimmed and not fully legible)
